Contact: Looking for an organizer? Contact with one of them through Slack. They have a HackUPC watermark like mine in their profile photos. If you want to contact with them personally, look for a person with a navy blue T-Shirt :tshirt:
Problem: Are you okay? If you are in trouble, please ping directly @felix and @marina and find an organizer. There are 25 around the venue. All of them wear navy blue T-shirts.
